regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_05_figure.png

/mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_06_text.png
regions.text:
Fig. 2. Number of papers published per year in medical image analysis, for the three types of XAI techniques. Most papers use a visual explanation. The y-axis shows the
number of papers included in this survey, the x-axis shows the year these papers were published in. The dashed line for 2020 is an extrapolation given the situation on
October 31, 2020.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_07_text.png
regions.text:
provided local, model-specific, post hoc explanation. Several re-
searchers used this technique in medical imaging (Table 2).

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_08_text.png
regions.text:
CAMs have also been used in medical image analysis in en-
sembles of CNNs. For example, Jiang et al. (2019) constructed
an ensemble of Inception-V3, ResNet-152, and Inception-ResNet-
V2 to distinguish fundus images of healthy subjects or patients
with mild diabetic retinopathy from those with moderate or se-

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_09_text.png
regions.text:
vere diabetic retinopathy; and provided a weighted combination
of the resulting CAMs for localization of diabetic retinopathy.
Lee et al. (2019b) constructed CAMs of the output of an ensem-
ble of four CNNs: VGG-16, ResNet-50, Inception-V3, and Inception-
ResNet-V2, for the detection of acute intracranial hemorrhage.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Med Image Anal. 2022 Explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) in deep learning-based medical image analysis/crops_ordered/page_04/region_10_text.png
regions.text:
Since medical images often contain information at mul-
tiple scales, multi-scale CAMs have also been _ proposed.
